content: **mini pumping** a small and fast proyect to give your workspace a little touch of *spooktober* it took me less than 10min to crochet this little pumpkin i used a 3mm hook with a 13wpi yarn but you can actually use any hook with a yarn that fits it and make it as big/small as your heart desires fun fact here in chile we don t have pumpkins as you may know them we have something called zapallo camote please look it up that s used in to make sopaipillas a traditional fried food that you may find on the street to eat with ketchup or with honey on rainy days please show me if you make some pumpkins taging me on the pictures as maiaracnido on insta <3 see ya
